channel.title: Subscribe to newsletter on Dressed in a Dress - The Sewing Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Subscribe to newsletter on Dressed in a Dress - The Sewing Journal

item.title: Confirm Your Subscription
item.description: Well done! To confirm your subscription, please, check your mailbox for a new email from me and click the verification button. If you don’t see the email, take a look at the spam box—unfortunately, an email may get caught there. xoxo, Kaia

item.title: Your subscription has been successful
item.description: Yay! Now I can send you notifications about all the lovely blog and pattern updates that are coming. Please, make sure the emails don’t get stuck in the spam box. And do not worry; I will not spam your mailbox—I do not write that fast. Thank you for joining my newsletter. xoxo, Kaia

item.title: Your un-subscription has been successful
item.description: From now on, you will no longer receive emails from me. It is a bit sad to see us part our ways. And I want you to know; you are welcome to come back anytime. Thank you for staying with “Dressed in a Dress”. xoxo, Kaia
